p: ADME results are presented in Table 3 (active compounds) and Table 4 (non-active compounds). To avoid mistake in our conclusion, that some compounds are active in 3 D because such cell cultures are more similar to in vivo conditions and that this is advantage in implementation of 3 D assay, we should excluded possibility that active compounds are active due to better ADME properties (especially solubility, and lipophilicity) in comparison to non-active compounds. Therefore, we profiled active and non-active compounds and see that ADME properties are the same for all tested compounds. In general, no significant difference was observed in ADME profile for these two set of compounds.
